00043 ObjectiveFunction* PatchPowerMeanP::clone() const
00044   { return new PatchPowerMeanP(*this); }
00045 
00046 
00047 bool PatchPowerMeanP::initialize_block_coordinate_descent( Mesh* mesh, 
00048                                                       MeshDomain* domain, 
00049                                                       const Settings* settings,
00050                                                       PatchSet* patch_set,
00051                                                       MsqError& err )
00052 {
00053   clear();
00054   PatchIterator patches( patch_set );
00055   
00056   PatchData pd;
00057   pd.set_mesh( mesh );
00058   pd.set_domain( domain );
00059   if (settings)
00060     pd.attach_settings(settings);
00061   
00062   bool result = true;
00063   while (patches.get_next_patch( pd, err ) && !MSQ_CHKERR(err))
00064   {
00065     double value;
00066     bool b = evaluate( ObjectiveFunction::ACCUMULATE, pd, value, false, err ); 
00067     MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00068     result = result && b;
00069   }
00070   return result;
00071 }
00072 
00073 bool PatchPowerMeanP::evaluate( EvalType type, 
00074                                 PatchData& pd,
00075                                 double& value_out,
00076                                 bool free,
00077                                 MsqError& err )
00078 {
00079   QualityMetric* qm = get_quality_metric();
00080   if (type == ObjectiveFunction::ACCUMULATE)
00081     qm->get_single_pass( pd, qmHandles, free, err );
00082   else
00083     qm->get_evaluations( pd, qmHandles, free, err );  
00084   MSQ_ERRFALSE(err);
00085   
00086     // calculate OF value for just the patch
00087   std::vector<size_t>::const_iterator i;
00088   double value, working_sum = 0.0;
00089   for (i = qmHandles.begin(); i != qmHandles.end(); ++i)
00090   {
00091     bool result = qm->evaluate( pd, *i, value, err );
00092     if (MSQ_CHKERR(err) || !result)
00093       return false;
00094     
00095     working_sum += mPower.raise( value );
00096   }
00097   working_sum /= qmHandles.size();
00098   
00099     // get overall OF value, update member data, etc.
00100   size_t global_count;
00101   value_out = qm->get_negate_flag() 
00102             * get_value( working_sum, 1, type, global_count );
00103   return true;
00104 }
00105 
00106 bool PatchPowerMeanP::evaluate_with_gradient( EvalType type, 
00107                                               PatchData& pd,
00108                                               double& value_out,
00109                                               std::vector<Vector3D>& grad_out,
00110                                               MsqError& err )
00111 {
00112   QualityMetric* qm = get_quality_metric();
00113   qm->get_evaluations( pd, qmHandles, OF_FREE_EVALS_ONLY, err );  MSQ_ERRFALSE(err);
00114   
00115     // zero gradient
00116   grad_out.clear();
00117   grad_out.resize( pd.num_free_vertices(), Vector3D(0.0,0.0,0.0) );
00118   
00119     // calculate OF value and gradient for just the patch
00120   std::vector<size_t>::const_iterator i;
00121   double value, working_sum = 0.0;
00122   const double f = qm->get_negate_flag() * mPower.value() / qmHandles.size();
00123   for (i = qmHandles.begin(); i != qmHandles.end(); ++i)
00124   {
00125     bool result = qm->evaluate_with_gradient( pd, *i, value, mIndices, mGradient, err );
00126     if (MSQ_CHKERR(err) || !result)
00127       return false;
00128     if (fabs(value) < DBL_EPSILON)
00129       continue;
00130     
00131     const double qmp = mPower.raise( value );
00132     working_sum += mPower.raise( value );
00133     value = f * qmp / value;
00134 
00135     for (size_t j = 0; j < mIndices.size(); ++j) {
00136       mGradient[j] *= value;
00137       grad_out[mIndices[j]] += mGradient[j];
00138     }
00139   }
00140   
00141     // get overall OF value, update member data, etc.
00142   size_t global_count;
00143   value_out = qm->get_negate_flag() 
00144             * get_value( working_sum, 1, type, global_count );
00145   const double inv_n = 1.0 / global_count;
00146   std::vector<Vector3D>::iterator g;
00147   for (g = grad_out.begin(); g != grad_out.end(); ++g)
00148     *g *= inv_n;
00149   return true;
00150 }
00151 
00152 bool PatchPowerMeanP::evaluate_with_Hessian( EvalType type, 
00153                                              PatchData& pd,
00154                                              double& value_out,
00155                                              std::vector<Vector3D>& grad_out,
00156                                              MsqHessian& Hessian_out,
00157                                              MsqError& err )
00158 {
00159   QualityMetric* qm = get_quality_metric();
00160   qm->get_evaluations( pd, qmHandles, OF_FREE_EVALS_ONLY, err );  MSQ_ERRFALSE(err);
00161   
00162     // zero gradient and hessian
00163   grad_out.clear();
00164   grad_out.resize( pd.num_free_vertices(), 0.0 );
00165   Hessian_out.zero_out();
00166   
00167     // calculate OF value and gradient for just the patch
00168   std::vector<size_t>::const_iterator i;
00169   size_t j, k, n;
00170   double value, working_sum = 0.0;
00171   const double f1 = qm->get_negate_flag() * mPower.value() / qmHandles.size();
00172   const double f2 = f1 * (mPower.value() - 1);
00173   Matrix3D m;
00174   for (i = qmHandles.begin(); i != qmHandles.end(); ++i)
00175   {
00176     bool result = qm->evaluate_with_Hessian( pd, *i, value, mIndices, mGradient, mHessian, err );
00177     if (MSQ_CHKERR(err) || !result)
00178       return false;
00179     if (fabs(value) < DBL_EPSILON)
00180       continue;
00181     
00182     const double qmp = mPower.raise( value );
00183     const double hf = f2 * qmp / (value*value);
00184     const double gf = f1 * qmp / value;
00185     working_sum += qmp;
00186 
00187     const size_t nfree = mIndices.size();
00188     n = 0;
00189     for (j = 0; j < nfree; ++j) {
00190       for (k = j; k < nfree; ++k) {
00191         m.outer_product( mGradient[j], mGradient[k] );
00192         m *= hf;
00193         mHessian[n] *= gf;
00194         m += mHessian[n];
00195         ++n;
00196         Hessian_out.add( mIndices[j], mIndices[k], m, err );  MSQ_ERRFALSE(err);
00197       }
00198     }
00199     
00200     for (j = 0; j < nfree; ++j) {
00201       mGradient[j] *= gf;
00202       grad_out[mIndices[j]] += mGradient[j];
00203     }
00204   }
00205   
00206     // get overall OF value, update member data, etc.
00207   size_t global_count;
00208   value_out = qm->get_negate_flag() 
00209             * get_value( working_sum, 1, type, global_count );
00210   const double inv_n = 1.0 / global_count;
00211   std::vector<Vector3D>::iterator g;
00212   for (g = grad_out.begin(); g != grad_out.end(); ++g)
00213     *g *= inv_n;
00214   Hessian_out.scale( inv_n );
00215   return true;
00216 }
